21-0_training_50_0:
SELECT MIN(cn.name) AS company_name, MIN(t.title) AS western_follow_up FROM cat_company_name_4 AS cn,
   cat_company_type_4 AS ct,
   cat_keyword_4 AS k,
   cat_movie_companies_4 AS mc,
   cat_movie_info_4 AS mi,
   cat_movie_keyword_4 AS mk,
   cat_title_4 AS t
WHERE t.id = mk.movie_id
AND mk.keyword_id = k.id
AND t.id = mc.movie_id
AND mc.company_type_id = ct.id
AND mc.company_id = cn.id
AND mi.movie_id = t.id
AND mk.movie_id = mc.movie_id
AND mk.movie_id = mi.movie_id
AND mc.movie_id = mi.movie_id
AND cn.country_code != '[us]'
AND (cn.name LIKE '%y%' OR cn.name LIKE '%m%')
AND ct.kind = 'production companies'
AND k.keyword = 'motorcycle'
AND mc.note IS NULL
AND mi.info IN ('Drama', '152', 'Japan:31 July 2002', 'USA:8 May 2007', 'USA:19 March 2009')
AND t.production_year BETWEEN 1979 AND 2012;
